title: robelneo
author: robelneo
content: The lottery is very popular here in our country you can find lotto outlets in almost every corner of our city, and there's always a long line whenever the top prize balloons I frequently bet in a lottery but every time I bet I just mark the LP sign in a lotto form which means Lucky Pick that is the machine will be the one to pick the numbers for you.My reason is I don't want to have attachments on numbers that I'm going to bet because it will make me a lotto betting addict, some bettors keep their favorite numbers to bet and they make sure that they bet on it daily in fear that it will come out when they failed to make a bet.In your country do you have this LP lucky pick feature in the lotto form and do you choose LP to make a bet for you or are you keeping numbers to bet, what are your reasons, and what's your success rate?

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: I bet on lottery few times because the lotto outlet is very far on my location but I’m always betting on my regular number such as my birthday and some birthday numbers related to someone very close to me as a good luck bet. Choosing numbers is what makes lottery betting special since you can be proud to yourself if you won using your own choice of number. Letting a machine decide on what number to bet is just like tossing money without enjoying it. Winning in lottery is harder than being hit by a lightning strike twice so why not enjoy the betting experience given that our chance of winning is very small. At least you have a little fun and excitement.PS: The sample picture of lottery card is very nostalgic since that our local lottery ticket.  Been ages since I touch one of those.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Eitherway would be valid given that luck is the determinant of the winning combination. However, I understand those who are betting for birth dates, special even in their life, and such with  corresponding number 'coz that's their belief and there's nothing wrong with it. For them it would help them get a winning bet sinply because they value those numbers but will never guarantee winning, same as with machine generated combinations. They know to themselves that if they are not lucky then no matter how many times they try then they won't still win but using their special numbers just simply makes their bet special. Just think of how happy they would be using a number they really think of.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: There is lottery somewhere ever! (sarcasm, I know some places won't play...but they are few)There are all types of lotteries, those that have selection samples, from 0-99 numbers, from 0-999, and so on in that sequence what they imagine they can do in the possible combinations and in that idea, some people tend to stay with their combinations over time, but, maintaining them or changing them does not improve or worsen the probability.In my case I practically don't play lotteries, but when I do it happens in the 100 number lottery and the 1000 lottery, in which I always play the same number, but such a strategy has not worked.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: i rarely buy a ticket. the last time was just when i remember my old pops going home and saw there was a lottery ticket booth. because of it i just bought 2 tickets just as he does every day. but i just also do the lucky pick. some people just believe they will one day win the set of numbers they keep. usually, it is a combination of birthdates and some important dates. can't even remember if my father won. but its what they do.

comments.author: LFC_Bitcoin
comments.body: I play the lottery and I have a set list of numbers I always pick. I actually have an automated direct debit on my bank account so I play the same numbers every week. I do that because it would be really upsetting if my numbers came up one week but I forgot to play.I’ve got 4 out of 6 numbers a few times and 3 numbers out of 6 a load of times but I’ve never been any closer to winning the jackpot. One day maybe.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on December 02, 2023, 04:24:07 PMThe lottery is very popular here in our country you can find lotto outlets in almost every corner of our city, and there's always a long line whenever the top prize balloons I frequently bet in a lottery but every time I bet I just mark the LP sign in a lotto form which means Lucky Pick that is the machine will be the one to pick the numbers for you.My reason is I don't want to have attachments on numbers that I'm going to bet because it will make me a lotto betting addict, some bettors keep their favorite numbers to bet and they make sure that they bet on it daily in fear that it will come out when they failed to make a bet.In your country do you have this LP lucky pick feature in the lotto form and do you choose LP to make a bet for you or are you keeping numbers to bet, what are your reasons, and what's your success rate?Lottery is also popular in my country (it used to be more popular before though) however there is a keys difference with lottery here and the lotteries around the world. We do not get to choose the numbers we want to gamble on. Here the lottery consist on small gambling cartoons which are pre-printed and distributed all around the country for people to buy and store until the day of the number drawing. Here we cannot walk in a gambling agency and choose numbers, just buy how many cartons as we wish. And keeping in mind they can be as expensive as a couple of flour kilos, people often opt for only buying one or two. If  people had the chance to choose, they would do it very often here, because superstition and folk religion here. People who dream with numbers go and pick up the cartoon there they can see those they dreamt of.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: I’m wondering if this is still a lottery because everyday there’s always a winner, I don’t think its still luck maybe something is going on that we don’t know. Well, I have to agree that lottery is very popular in our country, and most of the bettor have their own numbers that are betting since then and yes you can be addict with that which you will not realize since the price is just small if you think. I do bet in lottery with the same number though but I rarely bet due to the fact that I don’t have much time to go to the lottery vendor because of the conflict in working hours.

comments.author: Westinhome
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on December 02, 2023, 04:24:07 PMThe lottery is very popular here in our country you can find lotto outlets in almost every corner of our city, and there's always a long line whenever the top prize balloons I frequently bet in a lottery but every time I bet I just mark the LP sign in a lotto form which means Lucky Pick that is the machine will be the one to pick the numbers for you.My reason is I don't want to have attachments on numbers that I'm going to bet because it will make me a lotto betting addict, some bettors keep their favorite numbers to bet and they make sure that they bet on it daily in fear that it will come out when they failed to make a bet.In your country do you have this LP lucky pick feature in the lotto form and do you choose LP to make a bet for you or are you keeping numbers to bet, what are your reasons, and what's your success rate?The lottery was the famous game in many countries because of the jackpot win from the game,Even few people getting the winning money.The jackpot win from the lottery is enough for the new business and new life using the winnings from the lottery.The lottery number will be the autogenerated and urely based on the luck is the lottery game.The person who buy the lottery from the offline mode,he need to take care of the lottery ticket.Even the possibility of winnings was low,the person should take care of lottery ticket.I had some friends who had won huge money form lottery over a decade and running the peaceful life now.

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: I never allow the machine to pick numbers when I'm playing lottery. Why should I trust it more than my own intuition?Especially if I'm playing a small number of rows, I see no point. But the chances of getting the lottery are very small anyway, so it'll probably not matter either way. But just in case, I would never allow the machine to pick. Nobody tells me it's not backdoored.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: For me, I've never kept numbers, but still, I have never had any course to allow the machine pick a number for me, I've always place bets on my own personal numbers each time I visit a lotto shop to bet or play the lotto.But then though, I personally will chose to keep numbers instead of allowing machines to chose a number for me, and this is because I do not trust anybody or system, the machine might as well be dishing out numbers that will not play at the end of the day.So, it is practically better to keep your own numbers than having to constantly blame the machine for choosing a wrong numbers for you.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on December 02, 2023, 09:06:52 PMFor me, I've never kept numbers, but still, I have never had any course to allow the machine pick a number for me, I've always place bets on my own personal numbers each time I visit a lotto shop to bet or play the lotto.But then though, I personally will chose to keep numbers instead of allowing machines to chose a number for me, and this is because I do not trust anybody or system, the machine might as well be dishing out numbers that will not play at the end of the day.So, it is practically better to keep your own numbers than having to constantly blame the machine for choosing a wrong numbers for you. the machine will not decide who will win though. in the Philippines, the lottery is decided by the air-mix machine to pick the numbers which people will not see its rigged. unlike those scratch-off tickets where they could just not allow anyone to win no matter how many tickets are bought. its just them deciding how much a ticket could win.still, people are addicted to this lottery chasing their dreams to finally get out of poverty. i didn't even know anyone really won except for the rumors that this lottery is used for laundering officials.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Looking at the lottery ticket's image, it looks like we are in the same country, so obviously my answer to this question :QuoteIn your country do you have this LP lucky pick feature in the lotto formwould be a yes.Following the next question:Quote and do you choose LP to make a bet for you or are you keeping numbers to bet what are your reasonsI choose my own number, reason is that it is more fun and fulfilling if the number wins.and down to the last question:Quoteand what's your success rateMy answer is 0%.    I never had a luck on lottery or any gambling that draws the winner.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: We don't have LP but we have Television Bingo is called and people buy it,be them gamblers or not,people in here believe a lot in luck which is why most of them are poor   as luck cannot favor anyone.I have bought it sometimes as only to watch a program during the Sunday as it is given every Sunday in TV and what I have seen is that people who have nothing to do with gambling in general they are winning it which is funny enough for me.Tickets can also be bought in every corner and we have to fill in them ourselves,we choose the numbers to be printed in the tickets and this is a unique one,it is 15 from 90 as a game which is extremely difficult to get.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I remember my old neighbors before that they used to pick the same numbers and that's why despite that they have won a few times but not jackpots but combinations that has a prize still.I don't get into lottery but if I get into, I'll just let the machine generate numbers for me. Why? Because I think that there's an algorithm through these machines that might get into the jackpot accidentally.Well, what a reason right? But that's just me and that's what I think if ever I'll do.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: electronicash on December 02, 2023, 09:39:51 PMthe machine will not decide who will win though. in the Philippines, the lottery is decided by the air-mix machine to pick the numbers which people will not see its rigged. unlike those scratch-off tickets where they could just not allow anyone to win no matter how many tickets are bought. its just them deciding how much a ticket could win.That's true your pick or the machine everything depends on the drawing and the drawing has been fair all through the years so if you pick your numbers and you let the machine pick for you it doesn't matter, if you're lucky you are going to be lucky, there are even stories where one guy bet for the first time and he hit a jackpot,So it is a matter of luck, there are a lot of lottery winners in my country who won the grand prize through LP, so there's no difference the most important is you can handle your betting and much more you can handle yourself when you hit the jackpot.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: I do both of them, but I never keep numbers as I don't want any attachment as it may lead to addiction and fear of missing out when my numbers hit the jackpot or even the consolation prizes, I do random numbers and I do luck pick, it depends on my hunch and my feelings at the time of betting.The lottery is a luck-based game I often watch its drawing and it is fair so if it's your number that gonna come out it will come out regardless if it's your favorite number that you often bet or comes from the lucky pick, the most important thing is the fairness of the drawing of numbers.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Johnyz on December 02, 2023, 07:47:30 PMI’m wondering if this is still a lottery because everyday there’s always a winner, I don’t think its still luck maybe something is going on that we don’t know. For those smaller number combinations, yes. But not everyday though especially the 6/45 up to 6/49 and so on, that's why it reaches in 9 digits of hot pot because no one wins everyday. Although there are cases of 2-3 consecutive days of wins but not everyday.

comments.author: Oilacris
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on December 02, 2023, 04:24:07 PMThe lottery is very popular here in our country you can find lotto outlets in almost every corner of our city, and there's always a long line whenever the top prize balloons I frequently bet in a lottery but every time I bet I just mark the LP sign in a lotto form which means Lucky Pick that is the machine will be the one to pick the numbers for you.My reason is I don't want to have attachments on numbers that I'm going to bet because it will make me a lotto betting addict, some bettors keep their favorite numbers to bet and they make sure that they bet on it daily in fear that it will come out when they failed to make a bet.In your country do you have this LP lucky pick feature in the lotto form and do you choose LP to make a bet for you or are you keeping numbers to bet, what are your reasons, and what's your success rate?Well, you do actually have a point but at the same time its a bit contradictory on which telling about being not addicted because if you do compare out your way of betting and others been sticking with their own numbers then there's no much difference about it. It is really just that you are just betting on random numbers whereas other people do really bet on their personal choice numbers on which general essence on which you are just basically doing the same. When it comes to how big you do spend on tickets then this is where it would vary on which it do really give out those kind of difference in between bettors because purchasing ticket might really be that cheap but when it do piles up then it would really be that becoming that big.So its still not a thing that you should really be ignoring on.

comments.author: Assface16678
comments.body: Well in our country too, we have something like that, keeping the same number they bet because they believe that someday they will hit the jackpot, its called caring for the numbers, I bet in lotto a few times and yes I also have numbers that I don't change but I don't have a hope on winning just betting for fun or just simply betting, we all have different kinds of belief in lotto I'm sure of that anyways all are the same or the same aiming to win a jackpot, we can't intervene in someone's belief as they like that and we can also accept them, In my country beliefs in lotto are still popular.
